p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; line-height: normal; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

img.alt: Stay Connected Pewitt Consolidated Independent School District, Follow us on twitter @pewitt_CISD, Like us on Facebook

Pewitt Reads literacy- the ability to read and write- is essential to fully developing a sense of well-being and citizenship. Call or stop by Pewitt elementary for additional information on how you can help make a difference.

p.a:
PO BOX 1106 | US HWY 67 West
Omaha, Texas 75571

font.span: Pewitt CISD, 1330 US Highway 67 West, Omaha, TX 75571

b.span: Pewitt CISD does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, age, religion,
national origin, sex, marital status, disability or status as a U.S. Veteran.
Inquiries can be directed to the office of the Superintendent of Pewitt CISD at 903-884-2804.

div.p: Pewitt CISD does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, age, religion, national origin, sex, marital status, disability or status as a U.S. Veteran. Inquiries can be directed to the office of the Superintendent of Pewitt CISD at 903-884-2804.
